name: Yellow Cab
description:
Yellow Cab is a proof of concept/demo I created over the course of several weeks. The game is short, with only a single level that lasts two minutes, yet with a fair deal of replayability for some relaxing fun. 

I welcome any and all feedback regarding the game, as I hope to someday make this into a longer product. If you would also like to see this achieved, please feel free to make a donation, any amount is appreciated. The game is free but all donations go a long way towards this project.

Thank you and I hope you enjoy Yellow Cab as much as I've enjoyed making it!

P.S. While the title image and game's title on itch.io is "Yellow Cab", the files refer to it as "Yellow Car". This is due to my inability to decide on a title, I apologize for any confusion it might cause. Also while the pedestrian and car assets within the game are mine and all objects are made using Unity's Probuilder, I do not own the background music, which is a demo track from FL Studio called "One Day (Funky Mix)"
